results.title: Quantitative measurement of retinal thickness in patients with diabetic macular edema is useful for evaluation of therapeutic agents.
results.text_hl: ...The effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (an angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor) on @<m>DISEASE_Macular_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008269 @@@diabetic macular edema@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Macular_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008269 @@@DME@@@) was investigated by quantitative measurement of macular thickness.

citations.NLM: Funatsu H, Yamashita H, Shimizu E, Mimura T, Nakamura S, Hori S. Quantitative measurement of retinal thickness in patients with diabetic macular edema is useful for evaluation of therapeutic agents. Diabetes Res Clin Pract. 2004 Dec;66(3):219-27. PMID: 15536018
